availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: W H Payne (Bowling Green, Kentucky attorney)

body.p: Born in August 23, 1817 in Virginia. Attorney. Taught school in Mississippi in 1838. Studied law in Kentucky in the office of Loving and Grider and at Transylvania University. Elected county judge three times. Died on March 4, 1884 in Bowling Green.

bibl.p: M. Secrist, Warren County, Kentucky: History Revealed Through Biographical and Genealogical Sketches of its Ancestors (Lulu Press, 2013).
